channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Motorola Razr and Razr+ (2024): Specs, Features, Price, Release Date
item.description: Celebrating the 20th anniversary of the original Razr, Motorola has two new folding flip phones—and Paris Hilton is back to hype 'em up.

item.title: Firefox now lets you choose your preferred AI chatbot in its Nightly builds
item.description: As browsers continue to add AI features into their products, Mozilla is looking give users some choice in the matter. The company announced on Tuesday...

item.title: We’ve Spent Hours Reading and These Are Our Favorite E-Readers
item.description: These WIRED-tested slates let you take the world’s library anywhere.

item.title: Circular will pay competitor Oura royalties to sell its smart ring in the US
item.description: Smart ring makers Oura and Circular Tuesday announced a settlement in an ongoing patent suit. The agreed-upon terms find the French company entering i...

item.title: Microsoft Faces EU Charges Over ‘Abusive’ Bundling
item.description: The European Union has issued competition charges against Microsoft, accusing it of illegally linking Teams with Office.

item.title: Inspired by Gen Z, Pinterest users can now turn boards into videos for sharing on Instagram and TikTok
item.description: The new addition was inspired by the video-sharing activity that was already taking place on apps like TikTok. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved....

item.title: The Julian Assange Saga Is Finally Over
item.description: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange has agreed to plead guilty to one count of espionage in US court on Wednesday, ending a years-long legal battle betwe...

item.title: Stability AI lands a lifeline from Sean Parker, Greycroft
item.description: Stability AI, the beleaguered generative AI startup behind Stable Diffusion, has raised new cash. But it won’t reveal how much. Greycroft, Coatue Mana...

item.title: Linner Mars Review: Great Hearing Aids for Streaming Media
item.description: These hearing aids are excellent for media streaming and offer more than you’d expect at their $400 price.

item.title: Internet goes dark in Kenya in the wake of major protests over finance bill
